name: 6 Feet Behind (ApeHardware)
description:
• Something is wrong. 
  • They are after you.
  • You can't beat them.
  • But it can.

6 Feet Behind is a horror-themed beat-em-up where, instead of fighting the enemies yourself, you must lead a special enemy into colliding with them.

This game was originally a short GMTK Game Jam project with the theme "Out of Control" Now, it's a collection of 4 campaigns with different protagonists, pursuers and mechanics.
